question:
Which of the following statements are correct with respect to Attorney General of India?
1. He has the right of audience in all courts in the territory of India.
2. He has the right to speak and to take part in the proceedings of both the Houses of Parliament.
3. He does not enjoy all the privileges and immunities that are available to a member of Parliament.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Attorney General of India has the right of audience in all courts in the territory of India. He also has the right to speak and to take part in the proceedings of both the Houses of Parliament. And he enjoys all the privileges and immunities that are available to a member of Parliament in India.
